entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Dolbeau-Mistassini
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:24 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
